org.ensor.data.atom

Interface ISerializer<DictType,ListType>

  • Type Parameters:
    DictType - The data type for a serialized dictionary.
    ListType - The data type for a serialized list.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JSONSerializer, JSONStringSerializer, XMLSerializer

    public interface ISerializer<DictType,ListType>
    This interface provides a uniform way in which dictionaries and lists can be serialized and de-serialized.
    Author:
    jona

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImmutableDict serializeFrom(DictType aFrom)
      This method serializes a dictionary from the DictType format into an ImmutableDict object.
      ImmutableList serializeFromList(ListType aFrom)
      This method serializes a list from the ListType format into an ImmutableList object.
      DictType serializeTo(IDictionaryVisitable aDict)
      This method serializes a dictionary and converts it into the data type corresponding to the DictType.
      ListType serializeTo(IListVisitable aList)
      This method serializes a dictionary and converts it into the data type corresponding to the ListType.

    • Method Detail

      • serializeTo

        DictType serializeTo(IDictionaryVisitable aDict)
                     throws Exception
        This method serializes a dictionary and converts it into the data type corresponding to the DictType.
        Parameters:
        aDict - A dictionary to serialize.
        Returns:
        A serialized version of the given dictionary.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there is a serialization exception, it is thrown.

      • serializeTo

        ListType serializeTo(IListVisitable aList)
                     throws Exception
        This method serializes a dictionary and converts it into the data type corresponding to the ListType.
        Parameters:
        aList - A list to serialize.
        Returns:
        A serialized version of the given list.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there is a serialization exception, it is thrown.

      • serializeFrom

        ImmutableDict serializeFrom(DictType aFrom)
                            throws Exception
        This method serializes a dictionary from the DictType format into an ImmutableDict object.
        Parameters:
        aFrom - The serialized version of a dictionary.
        Returns:
        An ImmutableDict object containing the serialized data.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there is a serialization exception, it is thrown.

      • serializeFromList

        ImmutableList serializeFromList(ListType aFrom)
                                throws Exception
        This method serializes a list from the ListType format into an ImmutableList object.
        Parameters:
        aFrom - The serialized version of a list.
        Returns:
        An ImmutableList object containing the serialized data.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there is a serialization exception, it is thrown.
